other_title: The Day I Became a God
opening_theme: "Kimi to Iu Shinwa (君という神話)" by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi
ending_theme: #1: "Goodbye Seven Seas" by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi (eps 1-4, 6-8)
#2: "Takaramono ni Natta Hi (宝物になった日)" by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi (ep 5)
#3: "Natsunagi (夏凪ぎ)" by Jun Maeda x Nagi Yanagi (ep 9)
